Song.title: I Love You, Lord
Song.copyright: Laurie Klein Â© 1978, 1980 House Of Mercy Music (Admin. by Brentwood-Benson Music Publishing, Inc.)

Arrangement.text:
I [C]love You Lord And I [Dm/C]lift [C]my voice [C/Bb]To [F/A]wor-[C/G]ship [G/F]You [C/E]O my [Dm11]soul [Dm7]re- [G]joice [G7/B]Take [C]joy my King In [Dm/C]what [C]You hear May it [Csus/D]be [C/E]a [F]sweet [C/E]sweet [Dm11]sound [G]In [Am/G] [G7]Your [C]ear
{key:D} I [D]love You Lord And I [Em/D]lift [D]my voice [D/C]To [G/B]wor-[D/A]ship [A/G]You [D/F#]O my [Em11]soul [Em7]re- [A]joice [A7/C#]Take [D]joy my King In [Em/D]what [D]You hear May it [Dsus/E]be [D/F#]a [G]sweet [D/F#]sweet [Em11]sound [A]In [Bm/A] [A7]Your [D]ear
Arrangement.searchtext: i love you lord and i lift my voice to worship you o my soul re joice take joy my king in what you hear may it be a sweet sweet sound in your ear i love you lord and i lift my voice to worship you o my soul re joice take joy my king in what you hear may it be a sweet sweet sound in your ear
